title: The Foundlings
description: Pilot for the cult TV series about B.J. McKay, a guitar-playing independent trucker who travels with a fun-loving chimpanzee, named Bear, finds himself caught up with a bunch of young women trying to flee a white slaver who happens to be the local sheriff.

title: Odyssey of the Shady Truth
description: B.J. is tricked into returning to Orly County, where he's quickly arrested and imprisoned by the unscrupulous Sheriff Lobo. B.J. and his fellow falsely accused prisoners plot a jailbreak and a mad dash for the county line.

title: Shine On
description: B.J.'s truck are hijacked by three beautiful sisters. They need B.J.'s rig and his help in order to make a big moonshine run that will raise money for their ailing father's operation.

title: A Coffin with a View
description: It was a dark and stormy night when B.J and the Bear drove two Transylvanian coffins from Frisco to L.A., meeting up along the way with murder, mayhem and maybe even Count Dracula.

title: Deadly Cargo
description: BJ is hired by a lady to transport a deadly virus that she stole so she can take it to Washington d.c., where she can present it to congress & prove that her company is doing highly illegal & deadly work.

title: Never Give a Trucker an Even Break
description: It's a 3 ring circus for bj when he's dragged into the middle between a shady circus promoter, nasty gangster types, and a daredevil motorcycle stunt woman with a heart of gold.

title: Lobo's Revenge
description: It's an unbearable situation for BJ when sheriff Lobo kidnaps bear to lure BJ back into orly county.

title: Snow White and the Seven Lady Truckers: Part 1
description: B.J. and the Bear help lady trucker Snow White and her friends fend off attacks by the Hi-Ballers, a gang of truckers who don't cotton to competition from women in Winslow County, turf they control with corrupt cops Wiley and the Fox.

title: Snow White and the Seven Lady Truckers: Part 2
description: The Hi-Ballers under new leader Riker are relentless in their pursuit of B.J. and the Piston Packin' Mamas, especially after word gets out that B.J., Snow White, and the lady truckers are hauling truckloads of money for the Treasury Dept.

title: Cain's Son-in-Law
description: When B.J. rescues a young lady from an assailant it hits Captain Cain where he lives.

title: Run for the Money
description: All of B.J.'s greatest adversaries are assembled in Las Vegas for a Sheriff's Convention when a criminal gang stages an ambitious and inventive robbery of the Dunes Casino. Caught near incriminating evidence, B.J. is the prime suspect. (Part I of a three-part epic that continued on The Misadventures of Sheriff Lobo.)

title: Mary Ellen
description: What happens when B.J. and the Bear transport a circus veteran, his granddaughter and their trained elephant through the turf of Wiley and the Fox?

title: Gasohol
description: When High Ball Trucking corners the regional supply on diesel and tries to squeeze out the independent carriers, B.J. taps an alternative fuel source guaranteed to keep him ahead of Hammer and a pesky "revenuer."

title: BJ's Sweethearts
description: B.J. wrecks his truck and while Bobbie Sue nurses him back to health B.J reminisces about the many beautiful women in his past.

title: Fly a Wild Horse
description: B.J. goes from riding a rig to riding horseback when he helps a young Indian brave protect the region's wild horses from a corrupt rancher.

title: Silent Night, Unholy Night
description: BJ helps a pregnant lady who has some very incriminating evidence against the evil sheriff, Nathan McCandles, on Christmas Eve.

title: Fire in the Hole
description: B.J. brokers a reconciliation between Lil and her estranged father while also assisting Lil in fending off a crooked mining executive and his goons who are determined to lay claim to her gold mine.

title: Siege
description: Machine-gun-wielding mercenaries storm the Country Comfort truck stop and hold its occupants hostage, including the Panhandle Pussycats, cheerleaders for a popular football team. Will B.J. come through in time?

title: Through the Past, Darkly
description: Pamela Gerard escapes from a mental institution and hitches a ride with B.J. and the Bear.

title: Bear Bondage
description: When Bear becomes ill B.J. takes him to a vet and is subsequently told that he has died. However it turns out that the vet is secretly selling animals to a laboratory and Bear is still alive.

title: B.J. and the Witch
description: B.J. befriends a woman who is suspected of being a witch by the people from the town in which she lives. They have to deal with a plot to get rid of her that is hatched by the supersticious locals.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Beautiful
description: B.J. comes to Bishop and quickly becomes entangled in a war between Heaven's Devils and the Road Runners, two rival motorcycle gangs led by the feuding Delano brothers. Will B.J. and Captain Cain realize that "the enemy of my enemy is my friend" and team up against a common foe?

title: The 18-Wheel Rip-Off
description: B.J. goes undercover to infiltrate the auto ring that stole his rig while Sheriff Cordell detained him in jail on trumped-up charges. Assisting B.J. in his work is the attractive Tracy McBain, a young, idealistic and accident-prone peace officer.

title: The Friendly Double Cross
description: B.J. travels to Florida to visit his war buddy Charlie Broler, but a helicopter crash cuts short the friendly reunion. B.J. and an eager marine patrolwoman set to work unraveling the mystery. Musical performances from Sister Sledge and Jim Stafford highlight the episode.

title: B.J. and the Seven Lady Truckers: Part I
description: B.J. relocates to California and assembles a team of lady truckers to run a lucrative load from Los Angeles to San Francisco. But B.J.'s operation threatens to derail the gravy trains of Trans Cal Trucking and SCAT Captain Rutherford T. Grant.

title: B.J. and the Seven Lady Truckers: Part 2
description: B.J. and his convoy of lady truckers trek to San Francisco. Captain Grant declares war on B.J. and Bear Enterprises, establishing the conflict that will span this third and final season.

title: The Fast and the Furious: Part 1
description: Captain Grant and Trans Cal Trucking's new strongman Cooley conspire to put Bear Enterprises out of business, aided and abetted by a stranger with a secret.

title: The Fast and the Furious: Part 2
description: B.J. and Cooley race their trucks from Oakland to L.A., with the prize being a lucrative shipping contract. With so much depending on a McKay victory, will B.J. and the seven lady truckers find the time to right a wrong along the way?

title: Intercepted Pass
description: B.J., Callie and Samantha stumble upon Steiger's pet project: a call girl operation run out of a dating service that blackmails its clients with compromising photographs. But SCAT isn't the only party interested in getting that briefcase of evidence back from B.J.

title: Down & Dirty
description: While in Reno, Captain Grant capitalizes on Callie's compulsive gambling to make life difficult for B.J. and Bear Enterprises, but B.J. has a plan to even the odds.

title: Beauties and the Beasts
description: Grant and Steiger scheme to have the seven lady truckers imprisoned in Diablo County's tough women's prison. To spring his friends, B.J. agrees to a prisoners vs. guards football game. While Angie is in prison, B.J. cares for and mentors her rebellious nephew.

title: Blond in a Gilded Cell
description: An eccentric pop singer kidnaps beautiful blonde groupies and imprisons them in his mansion. When Stacks disappears, B.J. goes undercover as a singer to find and free her.

title: For Adults Only
description: B.J. befriends the Tiptons, an elderly but feisty couple being forced out of their home and into a retirement community that is being used as a cover for an illegal skin flick operation.

title: A Bear in the Hand
description: Captain Grant and Lt. Steiger set a match to a powder-keg when they abduct B.J.'s best friend Bear. B.J. and the lady truckers wage war against SCAT just when Grant is trying to woo appropriations funding from an influential state senator.

title: Seven Lady Captives
description: When the seven lady truckers are kidnapped to drug kingpin Leonard Marker's San Pepe compound, B.J., Fred and Hatsie Tipton and a very unlikely ally team up to rescue them.

title: S.T.U.N.T.
description: B.J., Callie and Stacks help B.J.'s old friend Steven Thomas Ulysses Nathaniel Travis complete the filming of his television pilot. Buster Crabbe is outstanding as an aging stuntman with a secret.

title: Who Is B.J.?
description: B.J wrecks his truck and suffers amnesia. As he struggles to remember who he is and why two men are attempting to kill him, he falls in love with Gypsy and works the bumper car pavilion of her uncle's carnival.

title: Detective Finger, I Presume
description: Cindy and Stacks go undercover at a gymnasium linked to a series of baffling burglaries, most recently one that netted a $400,000 painting entrusted to Bear Enterprises. Detective Finger, a cross between Columbo and Clouseau, joins B.J. in cracking the case.

title: The Two Million Dollar Hustle
description: B.J. enlists an unlikely ally in his effort to bring down Rutherford T. Grant after the crooked captain frames a bank robbery on Samantha, Stacks and Angie. Final episode of the series.
